CustomField.description: Progress - Shows images based on case stage showing the progress
CustomField.formula: CASE( Case_Stage__c , "Investigation", IMAGE('/resource/Investigation',"Investigation"), "Conference", IMAGE('/resource/Conference',"Conference"), "Hearing", IMAGE('/resource/Hearing',"Hearing"), "Judgment", IMAGE('/resource/Judgment',"Judgment"), "JEU Referral", IMAGE('/resource/JEUReferral',"JEUReferral"), "Closed", IMAGE('/resource/Closed',"Closed"), " ")
CustomField.label: Progress
